name: iTunes Preview Widget
author: Jordan Andree

sections.description:
Embeds an interactive iTunes Preview for an artist as a sidebar widget

Plugin’s Official Site

http://noblegiant.com/blog/2010/11/itunes-preview-widget/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire itunes-preview-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You will find the widget under Appearance > Widgets in the WordPress backend. All settings are editable there for each widget instance.
sections.faq: Do you have questions or issues with iTunes Preview Widget? You can ask the developer here
sections.changelog:
1.3.1

  • Fixed issue with widget not sending correct country to iTunes

1.3

  • Rewrite of widget settings administration
  • Added feature for LinkShare Affiliate ID for affiliate link generation
  • Multiple Widgets now supported

1.2

  • Fixed a bug with tracks not displaying in Mozilla Firefox

1.1

  • Fixed issues with Artist search
  • Aggregates albums based off of Artist ID rather than Artist name

1.0

  • Initial release

upgrade_notice: The required WordPress version has been changed and now requires WordPress 2.9 or higher. If you use WordPress 2.8, you will need to upgrade WordPress.
